name: DailyMeditation
0:
”Alexa, open Daily Meditation”
”Alexa, start Daily Meditation”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily meditation
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Feel more relaxed, with Daily Meditations led by yoga instructor Natalie Perez.

Join thousands of Alexa owners experiencing lower stress, less anxiety, and increased focus with Daily Meditation. 

FEATURED MEDITATIONS:
* Calming Breath Meditation 
* Releasing Fears Meditation 
* Self Confidence Meditation
* And many more...

HOW TO USE:
Get started by saying "Alexa, open Daily Meditation".
Daily Meditation will play your selected meditation until you say "Alexa, stop."

PAID SUBSCRIBER FEATURES:
* Additional subscriber-exclusive meditations
* Additional subscriber-exclusive categories: Daily, Focus, Sleep, and Stress

FEEDBACK AND SUGGESTIONS:
If you have questions or feedback, please send an email to support@volleythat.com

Created by Volley - the makers of the hit Alexa skills Song Quiz, Yes Sire, Price It Right, Are you Smarter Than a Fifth Grader, Family Duel, and Bedtime Stories.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
